decision_conditions:
APPROVAL CONDITION: Any advertisement displayed and any site used for the display of advertisements, shall be maintained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority. 

APPROVAL CONDITION: Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a safe condition. 

APPROVAL CONDITION: Where an advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the removal shall be carried out to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority. 

APPROVAL CONDITION: No advertisement is to be displayed without permission of the owner of the site or any other people with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission. 

APPROVAL CONDITION: No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to obscure, or hinder the ready interpretation of any road traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air, or so as otherwise to render hazardous the use of any highway, railway, waterway (including any coastal waters) or aerodrome (civil or military).
